title: Officially taliyah main now
body:
I am in love, I'm on the biggest win streak with taliyah jg and top

Screw all these plebs going mid and feeding, I've gotten S in the last 7 games in a row, and the 1 game I lost since I bought her I was still 17/7/ something

I'll share with you all a personal favourite taliyah jg build of mine that's been working out so perfectly, I like to call it the Blue Taliyah

Blue smite with runic echoes, Rylais, Liandry, Sorcerer shoes, Zhonya, Void staff

If you are going top taliyah, replace runic with ROA

Works perfectly, I've mastered most of her mechanics now, come ask me if you need any help

replies.body: If she was your main why aren't you called Gandalf and all chat you shall not pass every time you ult
I quote Donald trump every time I do instead

> [{quoted}](name=GalaxyGladious,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Vkb3o4JA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-29T13:03:06.406+0000)
>
> I quote Donald trump every time I do instead

MAGA
E and W synergies, your brain has no mechanics

er.. shes not point and click... your a special snowflake indeed.

guess azir has no mechanics either right?

Matchups ? I find laning agaisnt her incredibly easy as {{champion:55}}  but can't tell if they are a bad taliyah or it's just a counter.

Considering getting her, and just getting into the mage role in general, getting sick of assassins.
